Parameters.Name: CREDENTIAL-2-1-5-v15.06 GET CREDENTIAL INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN

Test.Name: Correct response

Test.TestName: CREDENTIAL-2-1-5-v15.06 GET CREDENTIAL INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response (empty access profiles list)
Test.Description: 8. If accessProfileInfoCompleteList is empty, skip other steps.

Test.TestName: CREDENTIAL-2-1-5-v15.06 GET CREDENTIAL INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response (MaxLimit = 1)
Test.Description: 10. If cap.MaxLimit less than 2, skip other steps.

Test.TestName: CREDENTIAL-2-1-5-v15.06 GET CREDENTIAL INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: second GetCredentialInfo (wrong token)
Test.Description: 15. If accessProfileInfoList[0].token does not equal to accessProfileInfoCompleteList[0].token, FAIL the test.

Test.TestName: CREDENTIAL-2-1-5-v15.06 GET CREDENTIAL INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: second GetCredentialInfo (wrong items number)
Test.Description: 14. If accessProfileInfoList contains more than one item, FAIL the test.

Test.TestName: CREDENTIAL-2-1-5-v15.06 GET CREDENTIAL INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: second GetCredentialInfo (empty list)
Test.Description: 13. If accessProfileInfoList is empty, FAIL the test.

Test.TestName: CREDENTIAL-2-1-5-v15.06 GET CREDENTIAL INFO WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Invalid response: first GetCredentialInfo (not empty list)
Test.Description: 7. If accessProfileInfoList is not empty, FAIL the test.
